thread.title: Not a restful night
thread.title_full: Not a restful night - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 20OnTheRoadAgain05
title: Not a restful night
text:
The first impressions were good and staff very friendly.
The room furnishings were fine but the floor had not been swept and there was strange stale smell in the bathroom. The AirCon was intermitently noisy.
By far the biggest problem was the constant road noise. The room I was in was next to a taxi cut through so throughout the night there were cars racing past.
Not much sleep was had which defeated the purpose of booking the room.
I mentioned the issues to the receptionist who was very polite but suggested I should have asked for a quiet room when making the booking!?
Room Tip: ask for a quiet room away from teh road See more room tips
